title: Energy Portfolio Risk Assessment
description: A risk manager needs to assess the market risk of a portfolio of solar, wind, and battery storage assets.

tasks.description: Retrieve the current positions and forward commitments for all assets in the portfolio.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compiles a complete list of portfolio assets and their contracted obligations.

tasks.description: Simulate portfolio performance under various market price scenarios (e.g., price spikes, low prices).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent runs Monte Carlo simulations to model potential profit and loss.

tasks.description: Calculate the portfolio's Value at Risk (VaR) at a 95% confidence level.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a single VaR figure representing potential losses.
